paper.title: Reinforcement learning model for optimizing generation bidding strategy with risk management
paper.abstract: With the special characteristics of electric power market, generation companies must manage the trade risk when optimizing their bidding strategies. This paper presents a two-level optimal bidding strategies model with portfolio management in the electric power market with staircase bidding curve and uniform market clearing mechanism for each trading period. At the high level, a Roth-Erov reinforcement learning method is applied to obtain the bid prices at equilibrium by simulation. Based on the theory of portfolio management, the unit capacity is optimally dispatched based on the mean-variance function at the low level subproblems. The optimal bidding strategy is thus achieved.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究电力市场中的投标策略优化，并明确提到了风险管理（trade risk）和投资组合管理（portfolio management）的应用。论文使用了均值-方差函数进行最优调度，这与投资组合管理的理论一致。因此，该论文的核心技术应用于金融风险管理和投资组合管理领域。
